participant_1.background:
My husband and I have been together for many years, and we are still very much in love.
i am an artist and create with my mind and my hands.
I enjoy the thrill of playing tennis and the freedom of driving my restored Mustang.
i use to be a huge superman fan as a child.
I like to listen to music from my childhood to make me feel younger.

i like nfl and college football.

my favorite activity is fishing.

content.text: Hi there! How are you doing today?

I am doing well, thanks for asking! I am an artist and create with my mind and my hands. I also enjoy the thrill of playing tennis and the freedom of driving my restored Mustang. I use to be a huge superman fan as a child and still like to listen to music from my childhood to make me feel younger. What about you?

I enjoy spending time with my pets, and I love to eat strawberries. I also like NFL and college football. I work in car sales, and my favorite activity is fishing. I enjoy my quiet life and green tea.
That sounds great! I enjoy fishing myself, although I am not very good at it. I have two dogs, a golden retriever and a beagle. They are my best friends!
That's awesome! I used to have a dog, but he passed away a few years ago. I miss him a lot.
I'm sorry to hear that. I know how much you loved him.
What are you up to today?
Not much, just hanging out. What about you?
I'm actually working on a new art project. I'm painting a picture of a beautiful landscape.
That sounds cool! I'd love to see it when it's done.
Sure, I'll send you a picture when it's finished.
